ygData.subject: Re: WnS
ygData.msgSnippet: Are they REAL rare in all areas? I ve been in WC quite a bit, and only seen one and heard of that one other (last night). ... From: Sandeep Shekar
ygData.messageBody:
Are they REAL rare in all areas? I've been in WC quite a bit, and only seen
one and heard of that one other (last night).

-----Original Message-----
From: Sandeep Shekar [mailto:sandeep@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 9:36 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] WnS


From: Sandeep Shekar <sandeep@...>

>What area are werewolves in? I've seen one and heard of someone fighting
one
>other in West Commons. Any other areas? Also, about what level are they?
>I've heard about 18-20th.

Regular werewolves (around 18-20) are found in West Commons, Kithicor, and
West Karana. There's a named rare werewolf (around 30) in North Karana
that sometimes spawns near the werewolf hunting party. And then there are
the high 20s (?) werewolves in Mistmoore castle.

Sandeep
